name: Microwave Oven Panasonic NN-ST35MKZPE Beige
origAbout: Like a chef - quick and easy. Dual Cooking - thanks to Inverter technology, the microwave power cooks food quickly, while the grill provides ordinary browning and crispiness. All this happens simultaneously, resulting in faster cooking. Quick 30 Function - this function enables you to quickly and simply cook for 30 seconds without the need for selecting additional settings. Each press of the button sets it for 30 seconds, and setting up to 5 minutes is possible.
